categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic awards

nodes.text: The Bronze Cluster was the first embellishment of the Kalidor Crescent, the highest honor awarded by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The Kalidor Crescent was awarded for extreme acts of heroism and gallantry against an overwhelming force. The Bronze Cluster was given after a live individual performed another instance of heroism and gallantry. It was a small cluster of bronze stars that were attached to the ribbon between the medallion and the kalidor.
